Dear Team.

I just received your web link address on the web site. I need your help regarding religious matter... I am from Islamic republic country of Pakistan.I need the shelter for my family because having threats from my in laws sides. Since 7 yers i am constantly try to get help in abaord such as amnesty, Asylum offices, Churches, Christiab Organization etc, etc, but after they heard my matter they are excused me...This time i also send this information to you for keeping hope that God will help me out by your support... if there is any single possibilty please reply me, and youewish to know my matter than advise i will discuss the same in details which is better to udnerstand my siatuation.

Awaiting to hear on same.

Regards

Alexander Peter.
+92 333232564
